commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six![/b] Miller is on the move! He crashes off his pads and over mid wicket! The crowd are on the edge of their seats!

message.text: Six! Miller is on the move! He crashes off his pads and over mid wicket! The crowd are on the edge of their seats!

commentaries.bbcode: D Hooda to D Miller, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: D Hooda to D Miller, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: D Hooda to D Miller, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: D Hooda to D Miller, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]50 for David Miller[/b]

message.text: 50 for David Miller

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six![/b] Super striking! Killer Miller is in hunt of this run chase, he is the potential match winner... will he go all the way?! Watson is sweating!

message.text: Six! Super striking! Killer Miller is in hunt of this run chase, he is the potential match winner... will he go all the way?! Watson is sweating!

commentaries.bbcode: D Hooda to D Miller, [b]WICKET!!! D Miller is out[/b] c Stuart Binny b Deepak Hooda
commentaries.autoText: D Hooda to D Miller, WICKET!!! D Miller is out c Stuart Binny b Deepak Hooda

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Watson sighs and looks relieved. Miller doesn't get all over this one and picks out Binny who was sweeping the cover boundary

message.text: Wicket! Watson sighs and looks relieved. Miller doesn't get all over this one and picks out Binny who was sweeping the cover boundary

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Dropped! [/b]Rahane chased hard in from mid on and dived at full stretch at his toes, his elbows hit the turf and the ball spilled out. That would have been one of the greats

message.text: Dropped! Rahane chased hard in from mid on and dived at full stretch at his toes, his elbows hit the turf and the ball spilled out. That would have been one of the greats

commentaries.autoText: C Morris to M Johnson, Wide delivery

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Johnson bravely gets down on one knee and scoops the slower one fine past the man in short, game on!

message.text: Four! Johnson bravely gets down on one knee and scoops the slower one fine past the man in short, game on!

commentaries.autoText: C Morris to M Johnson, %SPEED% full length on middle stump. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: Faulkner has the final over, this is high pressure stuff now!

message.text: Faulkner has the final over, this is high pressure stuff now!

commentaries.bbcode: Close! What an arm! Smith has a cannon at deep long on and Johnson manages to just get back for two

commentaries.bbcode: Close! Very aggressive running, a bit of luck as Samson drops the ball and now we only need 4 for a Super Over!

message.text: Close! Very aggressive running, a bit of luck as Samson drops the ball and now we only need 4 for a Super Over!

commentaries.bbcode: J Faulkner to A Patel. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: J Faulkner to A Patel. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Slashed away over point! We have a Super Over!

message.text: Four! Slashed away over point! We have a Super Over!

commentaries.bbcode: The teams cannot be split so we go into one of the most exciting moments in any sport... a Super Over!!

message.text: The teams cannot be split so we go into one of the most exciting moments in any sport... a Super Over!!

user.name: IndianPremierLeague
user.description: Follow to get exclusive and real-time Indian Premier League news and updates.

message.text:
SUPER OVER #IPL

— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) April 21, 2015

commentaries.bbcode: KXIP come to the crease and it is Marsh and Miller! Watson brings his troops to the field and has to mastermined this amazing finish. Chris Morris has the ball in his hand and Miller will take the first

message.text: KXIP come to the crease and it is Marsh and Miller! Watson brings his troops to the field and has to mastermined this amazing finish. Chris Morris has the ball in his hand and Miller will take the first

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to D Miller, [b]WICKET!!! D Miller is out[/b] lbw Chris Morris.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to D Miller, WICKET!!! D Miller is out lbw Chris Morris.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 1 - [/b][b]Wicket![/b] Miller misses the full toss and is plumb in front of the stumps! The finger goes up and the Super Over produces the unexpected already. 0/1

message.text: Ball 1 - Wicket! Miller misses the full toss and is plumb in front of the stumps! The finger goes up and the Super Over produces the unexpected already. 0/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to G Maxwell, one run.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to G Maxwell, one run.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 2 - [/b]Marsh skews the ball over the cover and it lands safe. 1 run! 1/1

message.text: Ball 2 - Marsh skews the ball over the cover and it lands safe. 1 run! 1/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Marsh, 5 runs, no-ball.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Marsh, 5 runs, no-ball.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 3[/b] - Four! It is a waist high no ball and it is slapped away past point. 6/1

message.text: Ball 3 - Four! It is a waist high no ball and it is slapped away past point. 6/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Marsh, FOUR.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Marsh, FOUR.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 4[/b] - Pulled away to the fence! What a strike! 10/1

message.text: Ball 4 - Pulled away to the fence! What a strike! 10/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Marsh, FOUR.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Marsh, FOUR.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 5 - [/b]Four! Smashed down the ground! Marsh is loving this moment and this rockets down the ground. 14/1

message.text: Ball 5 - Four! Smashed down the ground! Marsh is loving this moment and this rockets down the ground. 14/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Marsh, no run.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Marsh, no run.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 6 - [/b]A dot ball! Marsh misses a wide one outside his off stump. 14/1

message.text: Ball 6 - A dot ball! Marsh misses a wide one outside his off stump. 14/1

commentaries.bbcode: C Morris to S Marsh, 1 leg bye.
commentaries.autoText: C Morris to S Marsh, 1 leg bye.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 7 - [/b] A toe crushing yorker bounces off the boot and the players take a leg bye. 15/1

message.text: Ball 7 -  A toe crushing yorker bounces off the boot and the players take a leg bye. 15/1

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Super Over - Rajasthan Royals require 16 runs to win[/b]

message.text: Super Over - Rajasthan Royals require 16 runs to win

tweetjson.text: .@shaunmarsh9 take a bow. Can't believe that this is his first game for #IPL2015

user.name: Lisa Sthalekar
user.description: Former NSW and Australian Cricketer. Cricket commentator and specialist Coach. Love movies, a glass of wine & a tragic netball supporter. These views are my own

message.text:
.@shaunmarsh9 take a bow. Can't believe that this is his first game for #IPL2015

— Lisa Sthalekar (@sthalekar93) April 21, 2015

commentaries.bbcode: Sehwag leads his side out with all his experience. Mitchell Johnson will have the responsibility of the bowling, the Royals have Watson taking the first ball and Faulkner at the non strikers. It is an all Australian affair!

message.text: Sehwag leads his side out with all his experience. Mitchell Johnson will have the responsibility of the bowling, the Royals have Watson taking the first ball and Faulkner at the non strikers. It is an all Australian affair!

commentaries.bbcode: M Johnson to S Watson, [b]WICKET!!! S Watson is out[/b] b Mitchell Johnson.
commentaries.autoText: M Johnson to S Watson, WICKET!!! S Watson is out b Mitchell Johnson.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 1 - Wicket![/b] Timberrrrr! Watson moves to leg and misses the accurate yorker, off stump is uprooted! In comes Steve Smith! 16 off 5...

message.text: Ball 1 - Wicket! Timberrrrr! Watson moves to leg and misses the accurate yorker, off stump is uprooted! In comes Steve Smith! 16 off 5...

commentaries.bbcode: M Johnson to S Smith, 5 runs, no-ball.
commentaries.autoText: M Johnson to S Smith, 5 runs, no-ball.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 2 - [/b]No ball waist high full toss... edged away fine on the off side by Smith. RR also get an extra ball. 11 off 5...

message.text: Ball 2 - No ball waist high full toss... edged away fine on the off side by Smith. RR also get an extra ball. 11 off 5...

commentaries.bbcode: M Johnson to S Smith, one run.
commentaries.autoText: M Johnson to S Smith, one run.

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 3 - [/b]The yorker is dug out down the ground by Smith and a single is taken. 10 off 4...

message.text: Ball 3 - The yorker is dug out down the ground by Smith and a single is taken. 10 off 4...

commentaries.bbcode: M Johnson to J Faulkner, [b]WICKET!!! J Faulkner is out[/b] run out (Wriddhiman Saha).
commentaries.autoText: M Johnson to J Faulkner, WICKET!!! J Faulkner is out run out (Wriddhiman Saha).

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Ball 4 - Wicket![/b] Faulkner winds up a slog to leg and misses the ball. He was outside his crease and Saha keeps his cool to run him out and win the match

message.text: Ball 4 - Wicket! Faulkner winds up a slog to leg and misses the ball. He was outside his crease and Saha keeps his cool to run him out and win the match

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Match Tied (Kings XI Punjab win Super Over)[/b]

message.text: Match Tied (Kings XI Punjab win Super Over)
